1222320.name: Mowing Simulator
1222320.description:
Take a mower in the relaxing MOWING SIMULATOR!
Mow grass manually at various levels such as yards, parks and lawns and even overpasses, golf courses and skyscraper roofs as well as at the most recognizable locations around the world such as the lawn of the White House in Washington or the Versailles Garden in Paris. Run your own gardening company, earn money and invest in its development.

In addition to mowing, customize numerous lawnmower models, gas weed-whackers and tractor mowers — change their appearance, colors and parts. You will be able to replace worn equipment parts and repair them when they become damaged. Be sure to avoid obstacles as swimming pools, flowers and decorations in order to avoid equipment failure and penalties for the damage made!

KEY FEATURES

  • Cut grass on different levels: backyards, parks, viaducts, etc.
  • Mow lawns in famous and historic places around the world as the lawn of the White House in Washington.
  • Take care of the lawns and relax, but remember to be precise and avoid obstacles!
  • Choose the best equipment from a wide range of mowers, gas weed-whackers and tractor mowers — whatever your heart desires!
  • Work in the workshop — repair and replace damaged or worn parts of machines.
  • Make money and invest them in the development of your own gardening business.
1222320.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 俄语, 乌克兰语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
